original_text: Then Paul said to him, “God is going to strike you, you whitewashed wall! Are you sitting to judge me according to the law, and yet contrary to the law you order me to be struck?”
korean_text: 바울이 이르되 회칠한 담이여 하나님이 너를 치시리로다 네가 나를 율법대로 심판한다고 앉아서 율법을 어기고 나를 치라 하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: God is going to strike you,
Are you sitting to judge me according to the law,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 율법에 따라 나를 심판하려고 앉았느냐,

sentences.original_text: and yet contrary to the law,
you order me to be struck?”
